aggregation.name: average_temperature
aggregation.statement: select avg(intResult) from Observation(datastream.id.toString() like 'tmp%').win:time(30 sec)

query.name: full_alert
query.statement: select datastream.thing.id from Observation(datastream.id.toString() like 'fill%' and intResult> 75)

post-process.name: weight
post-process.statement: select datastream.thing.id as binID, intResult*10000 as weight  from Observation(datastream.id.toString() like 'fill%')

fusion.name: stinky_bin
fusion.statement: select 'bin1' as binID  from Observation(datastream.id.toString() like '%1'  and ( intResult> 25 or intResult> 50)).win:time(1 sec)  having count(*)=2

broker_route.name: stinky_bin_route
broker_route.statement: select 'bin2' as binID  from Observation(datastream.id.toString() like '%2'  and ( intResult > 25 or intResult > 50)).win:time(1 sec)  having count(*)=2

topic_broker_route.name: stinky_bin_route2
topic_broker_route.statement: select 'bin3' as binID  from Observation(datastream.id.toString() like '%3'  and ( intResult> 25 or intResult> 50)).win:time(1 sec)  having count(*)=2

payload_translate.name: stinky_bin_route_translate
payload_translate.statement: select 'bin4' as binID  from Observation(datastream.id.toString() like '%4'  and ( intResult > 25 or intResult > 50)).win:time(1 sec)  having count(*)=2

payload_transform.name: stinky_bin_route_transform
payload_transform.statement: select 'bin5' as binID  from Observation(datastream.id.toString() like '%5'  and ( intResult > 25 or intResult > 50)).win:time(1 sec)  having count(*)=2

protocol_translate.name: protocol_translate
protocol_translate.statement: select event from Observation as event
